name: Soccer Physics Fight
summary:
Soccer Physics Fight is a football game and is developed to play in single or 2 players mode.
Two teams are fighting for a ball and the one who scores a goal will be the winner. There are two buttons used to control the players of each team. Pressing it will make the players jump upwards and also kick the ball or team of the other side.
Every new round there will be given new balls to play, other characters and backgrounds.
This is game is developed to play with your friends, family and sometime also nice to make bets with you opponents!
Just a very simple game for football lovers!
